Author: Ottermandias
Name: Accountant
Description:
Keep track of retainer, airship, submersible, aetherial wheel and crop timers
as well as several miscallaneous tasks of multiple characters.
Punchline: Character task timers.

Author: yomishino
Name: ActionEffectRange
Description:
This plugin provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action you just used.

May be used as a supplement/replacement to the actions' VFXs in showing effect range related information, such as where has the action landed and how large an area it covered.
Punchline: Provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action just used.
Changelog:
v2.0 new features & updates: 
 - Effect range for automatically triggered actions, such as heals from Earthly Star when the status effect expires 
 - Effect range for summoned pets/companions in addition to ACN/SMN/SCH pets, such as DRK's Esteem and MCH's Autoturret (PvP) 
 - Improved implementation and other bug fixes

Author: LeonBlade
Name: Burning Down the House
Description: Move around housing items with coordinates and allows you to place anywhere.

Author: d87
Name: BigPlayerDebuffs
Description: Scales up buffs/debuffs applied by you on Target Status frames
Punchline: Larger personal debuffs

Author: Asgard
Name: Brio
Description: Control actors during GPose sessions.
Punchline: Actor control for GPose.

Author: Haplo064, Khayle
Name: Chat Bubbles
Description: Using native chat bubble display, see who is talking about what in a more natural fashion.
Punchline: Enables in-game chat bubbles.

Author: kij
Name: ChatCoordinates
Description:
Places flag marker on map from coordinates in chat.
Opens map with given coordinates for current or given zone.
See "/coord" for configuration and usage info.
Punchline: Places flag marker on map from coordinates in chat.

Author: MidoriKami
Name: Daily Duty
Description:
Automatically track and complete many daily and weekly tasks.

/dd help â†’ Display all available commands
Punchline: Easily Track Daily and Weekly tasks

Author: goat, modded by Franz
Name: Discord Chat Bridge
Description: This plugin allows you to receive your chat messages via Discord.
Punchline: Receive your chat messages via Discord.
Changelog:
Adds a bandaid for Discord's new username changes. Remember to thank Discord for removing discrimination from their platform. The bot also always accepted user ID numbers, but now it's explicitly mentioned in the setup window.'.

Adds the following new commands:
- xl!toggledefaultnameavatar - Switches webhook mode to use a generic bot username and avatar so messages stack. Should be combined with xl!togglesender or you will have no idea who said what.

Author: goat
Name: Ultrawide Cutscenes
Description:
This plugin removes the "letterboxing" bars when watching cutscenes on ultrawide monitors.
Beware! You may see things that you are not supposed to be seeing, such as upcoming NPCs popping in or T-posing.

Thanks to aers for finding this.
Punchline: Remove letterboxing from cutscenes on ultrawide monitors.

Author: goat
Name: Fancy Loading Screens
Description:
This plugin shows the destination zone's concept art while loading.
NOTE: ONLY LOOKS RIGHT ON 16:9 SCREENS! The concept art is not any bigger, and we can't expand/fix it. Sorry!
Punchline: Shows the destination zone's concept art while loading

Author: goat
Name: Discord Rich Presence
Description: This plugin allows you to show your zone, job, level, name, and world in your Discord status.
Punchline: Show your zone, job, level, name, and world in your Discord status

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Death Recap
Description:
Quickly figure out what killed you or your party members!

Shows:
- Healing
- Damage taken
- Debuffs
- Buffs
- Barriers
- Addle, Feint, Reprisal on damage source
Punchline: Quickly figure out what killed you or your party members!

Author: WildWolf
Name: DeepDungeonDex
Description:
A live bestiary for Deep Dungeon.
Shows target mob aggro type, a subjective threat level, status vulnerabilities, and a general overview of notable mechanics.
Threat level is meant to be taken with a grain of salt, is aimed towards solo players, and assumes a general familiarity with deep dungeon mechanics and the class being played.
Information is accurate to the best of my knowledge based on crowdsourced information, but I could use your help! Please open an issue on the GitHub if you'd like to correct inaccurate or untested data.
Original by Strati
Punchline: Live monster data for Deep Dungeons.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Distance
Description:
Displays the distance in yalms to your target and/or other enemies, players, NPCs, etc.  It can also display the aggro range for supported bosses.
Please note that this plugin automatically downloads updates for aggro data by default.  This can be disabled in the plugin settings if you wish.
Punchline: Target distance widgets.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: EnemyListHP (former EnmityHp)
Description: Displays enemies hp in enemy list. Just does that, nothing else.
Punchline: Displays enemies hp in enemy list.

Author: daemitus
Name: ezFauxHollows
Description: This plugin highlights tiles in Faux Hollows that represent the best potential action you can take.
Punchline: Highlights recommended tiles in Faux Hollows for your next move.

Author: Caraxi
Name: FPS Plugin
Description: Display game FPS. It really is that simple.
Punchline: Display game FPS.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: GatherBuddy
Description:
Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations
via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions.
Punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing.

Author: Tischel
Name: Inventory Search Bar
Description:
Supports different types of filters to be able to find items by name, type, supported job or level requirements.

Supported Inventories:
	- Character Inventory
	- Chocobo Saddlebags
	- Retainer Inventory
	- Armoury
Punchline: Adds a search bar directly in the inventory window to filter items.

Author: Critical_Impact
Name: Allagan Tools
Description:
Allagan Tool's primary purpose is to keep track of items across your characters/retainers/free company. With it's filter system you'll never lose track of items or not know where they should be sorted.

While this is it's primary purpose, it has quite an exhaustive list of other features including:
	- Craft planning
	- Market board integration
	- Item highlighting in inventories when searching/sorting and picking ingredients for crafts
	- Item window that includes vendor and source information among other things
	- Duty/mob/airship/submarine windows that are fully searchable
	- A filtering system that lets you setup complex searches for specific items 
	- Tooltip integration that'll let you see where the items are on hover
Punchline: Get organized in FFXIV, easily locate/show where to sort items, plan your crafting, and search for mobs, duties, airships, and submarines!

Author: electr0sheep
Name: Item Vendor Location
Description: Adds a context menu option for items that will show you where to find items you can buy off a vendor
Punchline: Shows you where to buy vendor items
Changelog:
- Added Chinese localization (Nuko)
- Fix for some Aenc Ose shop data (Nuko)
- Removed Garland Tools
- GC bug fixes
- Add keybinding modifier option

Author: ocealot
Name: JobBars
Description: Additional job gauges, party buff timers, mitigation trackers, and more. Icon by PAPACHIN
Punchline: Extra job gauges

Author: Bluefissure
Name: MapLinker
Description: Automatically record the maplinks in chat and retrieval later.
Punchline: Record the maplinks in chat

Author: fmauNeko
Name: Market board
Description: Browse the market board. /pmb to open.
Punchline: Browse the market board from anywhere.

Author: daemitus
Name: ezMiniCactpot
Description: This plugin highlights tiles and lines in MiniCactpot that represent the best potential action you can take.
Punchline: Shows the next best move in Mini Cactpot.

Author: Bluefissure
Name: MultiHit
Description: Papa asked me for this so here it is.
Punchline: Split flytext into multiple flytext.

Author: aers, JHerig, abashby
Name: Nameplate Debuffs
Description: Displays your debuffs on enemy nameplates.
Punchline: Displays debuffs you cast on nameplates of enemies

Author: karashiiro
Name: PingPlugin
Description: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.
Punchline: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.

Author: Anna
Name: Quest Map
Description:
Explore quests and their rewards.
- Search for quest names or their rewards, including instances,
  beast tribes, minions, etc.
- See an interactive map of quest requirements and unlocks.
- Open a quest info window even for quests you haven't completed.
- Open quest starting locations on the map or open quests in the journal.

Icons: treasure map by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project and
locked book by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project
Punchline: Explore quests and their rewards.

Author: Chalkos
Name: RepairMe
Description: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted.
Punchline: Never forget to repair & extract materia again!

Author: Ottermandias
Name: RezPls
Description:
Easy overview about who is currently resurrecting who,
who is already resurrected,
and who has removable detrimental status effects in the world 
as well as in the group or alliance interface.
Punchline: Highlighting of Raises and detrimental status effects.

Author: Det
Name: Target Furniture
Description:
Currently, the only possible way to select a housing item is to click the furniture itself, and this can be a problem if you have multiple items close to each other.

This plugin adds a new option in the Housing Menu that targets the furniture for you
Punchline: You can now select furnitures from the Housing Menu

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: TextAdvance
Description: Quest speedrunning assistance tool. Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping

Author: MgAl2O4
Name: TriadBuddy
Description:
Triple triad solver, NPC matches only.
- highlights next move during mini game
- evaluates all deck presets before match
- deck optimizer for NPC
- adds more details to card collection window
Punchline: Triple triad solver

Author: ocealot
Name: VFXEditor
Description: VFX, animation, and sound editing plugin. Icon by PAPACHIN
Punchline: VFX editor and viewer

Author: Dragon
Name: Visibility
Description:
Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp
Punchline: Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.

Author: Avaflow, NPittinger
Name: Waitingway
Description:
Contributes and utilizes crowdsourced login queue information for the benefit of everyone.

Current features include queue notifications via Discord, so you can know when you make it into the game, as
well as anonymously collecting and reporting statistics about your login queue times to crowdsource information
about FFXIV server load. This information will be publicly available in the future; check the Discord for updates!

Future planned features include login wait time estimates, as well as duty queue time statistics, and a website
showing all of this information.

Discord URL: https://discord.waitingway.com
Punchline: Crowdsourced FFXIV login queue times, now with Discord queue notification features.

Author: PunishedPineapple, abashby
Name: Waymark Preset Plugin
Description: Allows you to save, edit, place, import, export, and preview an unlimited number of waymark presets.
Punchline: Improved Waymark Management

Author: Asgard
Name: XAT
Punchline: Create and edit animations and cutscenes.
Description: Create and edit animations and cutscenes.

Author: daemitus
Name: Yes Already
Description: Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).
Punchline: Clicks Yes in various dialogs you've specified.

Author: daemitus, hiroa
Name: ZodiacBuddy
Description: This plugin attempts to help you complete your Zodiac weapon in various ways.
Punchline: Complete your Zodiac relic with style.

Author: Left
Name: ACT Endcounter
Description: Pairs with ACT, automatically invokes 'end' at the end of combat. Additional options to invoke 'end' at the start of combat as well. Plus an option to clear your entire encounter when entering a duty.
Punchline: Ends your encounters with ACT

Author: yomishino
Name: Aether Compass
Description:
This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.

Icon by Lumas Arkfrost
Punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs

Author: UnknownX
Name: A Realm Recorded
Punchline: Allows you to use the duty recorder
Description: Adds additional features to the duty recorder and automatically starts it in most instances. Please make sure the setting is enabled inside "/record".

Author: Icehunter
Name: AutoTranslateXIV
Description: Translates Stuff
Punchline: Translates From A to B where A/B are set in config.

Author: Kaz Wolfe
Name: BatteryGauge
Description:
Hey, you! Yes, you! Do you play FFXIV on your laptop? Or are you so addicted to FFXIV that you have a UPS on your desktop just so you can keep playing through power outages? Then this is the plugin for you!

BatteryGauge adds a battery indicator to your server info bar showing your current battery percentage and expected remaining lifespan (as reported by Windows).
Punchline: Keep track of your FFXIV device's battery.

Author: Sl0nderman
Name: Blue Mage Helper
Description: Adds monster names and coordinates to the "Where to Learn" section of your blue mage spellbook.
Punchline: Helps you fill our your Blue Mage Spellbook

Author: Styr1x
Name: Browsingway
Description:
Renders browser overlays in-game to enable playing in fullscreen (and G-SYNC) while having access to ACT overlays.
Use the settings button below or the '/bw config' command to configure.
Based on the BrowserHost plugin by ackwell.
Punchline: Browser overlays rendered in-game.

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Character Panel Refined
Description: Refine the character panel to display useful information like crit and direct hit chance

Author: Azure Gem
Name: CharSync
Punchline: Synchronize characters data
Description: Synchronize characters data automatically upon changing zones and logout, and allows to define multiple character groups to synchronize with. This is based upon goat's work, without using native hooks

Author: Arrest Everybody
Name: ChatEmoteColor
Description: A simple plugin that recolors emote chat lines depending on who is executing the emote and their target.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Chat Translator
Punchline: Enables in-game chat translation.
Description: Automatically translating text in your chat-box, from various languages to one you specify.

Author: Aelexe
Name: Coin Pouch
Description: Currency alerts and convenient teleports.
Punchline: Currency alerts and convenient teleports.

Author: ItsBexy
Name: CrossUp
Description:
This plugin provides various customizations for the look and feel of the Cross Hotbar.

-Split up the left/right hotbars
-Display Expanded Hold Controls Separately
-Customize colors and element positions
-Greater control over which sets your extra bars are mapped to
Punchline: Customize the Cross Hotbar!

Author: goat
Name: Character Data Sync
Description:
This plugin allows you to use your character data from your main character on all others.

In-game, use the configuration menu to choose your main character, the restart the game to start syncing!
Punchline: Sync your character data from your main character to all others

Author: Infi
Name: Death Roll Helper
Description:
Plugin to help with a number of /random and /dice related games.

Venue Mode:
    + Concise display of all concurrent players in a list-based format
    + Includes functionality for Truth or Dare and Giveaway modes 
    + Support for multiple sorting types (min, max, nearest to) 
    + Highlight numbers based on regex matching 
Death Roll Mode:
    + Support for multiple players
    + Automatically checks for correct number ranges from each player
Tournament Mode:
    + 1 vs 1 Death Roll Tournament
    + Automatic bracket generation
    + Uneven number of players get filled with byes
    + Randomization via shuffling is enforced
    + Forfeit functionality if a player needs to leave

Features:
    + Can block or prevent players from partaking in any of your games 
    + Accepts only /random or /dice commands
    + Ease of removing players from partaking in the concurrent game/tournament

Includes language support for English, German and French FFXIV clients. (Japanese support is planned)
More features are planned for future updates in accordance with feedback.
Punchline: Plugin to help with a number of /random and /dice related games.

Author: iamevn
Name: Doman Mahjong Status
Description: Use /mjstat command to log current stats.
Punchline: log mahjong play stats

Author: Roselyn
Name: Elden Ring April Fools
Description: Currently under development with extra features, should currently function as the April Fools joke did.
Punchline: Recreation of the Elden Ring April Fools joke.

Author: BiscuitUmU, Kazumi
Name: Fantasy Player
Description:
Control Spotify playback from within FFX|V
Use the button below to open settings or use the '/pfp settings' command.

Author: Khloe Leclair
Name: Gearset Helper Plugin
Description: Displays extra information about a character's gearsets when Examine is open, and makes it easy to export gearsets to Etro or Ariyala.
Punchline: Display estimated stats with Examine, and export gear to Etro/Ariyala.

Author: Fr4nsson
Name: Hide Padlock
Description:
Allows you to toggle the visibility of the padlock that is next to hotbar one.

Use /padlock to toggle visibility.
Use //padlock to open settings.
Punchline: Hides the padlock.

Author: Kirrana
Name: High FPS Physics Fix
Description:
Causes the game's physics to work at higher FPS by making it update every second frame. 
Toggle with /physics. 
May cause excessive jiggling at lower FPS values. 
Disabling the entire plugin after turning on/off with /physics requires reboot to reenable.
Punchline: Cuts the refresh rate of physics in half, "fixing" it at high fps.

Author: Necoji (prev. ascclemens)
Name: HUD Manager
Description:
- Save infinite HUD layouts
- Swap between HUD layouts based on conditions
- Make child layouts that only affect desired HUD elements
- Change visibility of job gauges
- Export and import layouts from text
Punchline: Take total control over your HUD.

Author: Dragon
Name: Hunt Buddy
Description: A daily hunt bill tracker
Punchline: Helps you track your daily hunt bills

Author: BitsOfAByte
Name: Kiko Guide
Description:
Roulettes keep placing you in duties with bosses you've forgotten how to fight? KikoGuide has you covered! Provides comprehensive guides for duty content such as Dungeons, Trials and Alliance Raids. Only shows duties that you've unlocked to prevent spoilers :)

Key features:
- Automatically open a guide when entering a duty
- Neat boss mechanic tables
- A strategy "TLDR" mode
- & more to come!
Punchline: The ultimate guidebook for in-game duties, great for daily roulettes!

Author: Infi
Name: Easy MBHistory
Description: Copies the marketboard transaction history into your clipboard with configurable options.
Punchline: Useful for when you want to quickly export marketboard transaction history.

Author: Eternita
Name: XIV Instant Messenger
Description:
Features:
- Opes a direct message window when you message someone or they message you
- Each window contains your DM chat with certain person
- Open and cycle through recent chats with a hotkey
- Execute emote commands on a player from their DM window without needing to manually target them
- Automatically record your chat log in an easy to read text file
- Fully customizable styles
Punchline: A direct message manager made in fashion of WoW Instant Messenger.

Author: Samuelka
Name: Mount Collectioner
Punchline: Plugin for track collected mounts
Description: A plugin allows you to track received mounts by character.

Author: Gotest
Name: Mouse Target Tooltip
Description: A plugin that shows a tooltip for mouseover targets.
Punchline: Shows a tooltip with a little information for characters that the mouse is over.

Author: Talim
Name: MPTimer
Description: Simple MP timer status bar for black mages. Shows the time until your next MP tick, and optionally shows a marker indicating when it is safe to cast Fire III without losing an MP tick.

Author: Meisterlala
Name: Neko Fans
Description:
Shows you an image of a random neko character. Click on the image to view the next one. 
Warning: You might see naughty images
Punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl.

Author: Kaminaris
Name: NextUIPlugin
Description: OverlayPlugin replacement for Dalamud, works similarly to BrowserHost with addition to having more options and built in websocket server.
Punchline: OverlayPlugin for Dalamud with built in HUD replacement

Author: Bluefissure
Name: No Kill Plugin
Description: A simple plugin that prevent the game from killing itself.

Author: Eternita
Name: NotificationMaster
Description: Notifies you about various events while your game is minimized.

Author: Bluefissure
Name: OBSPlugin
Description: A plugin to control OBS by websocket.

Author: Sl0nderman
Name: Ocean Fishin'
Description:
Automatically recommends bait to use based on your ocean fishing route. 
You'll get suggestions for spectral fish, fisher's intuition buff, and missions.
Punchline: Suggests bait for ocean fishing.

Author: darkarchon
Name: Oh gee, CD
Description:
OGCD assistant providing Text To Speech, (Custom) Sound Effects and unlimited extra bars to visualize and alert you for your OGCDs.

This is an early version and things might still break. For any issues please contact darkarchon#4313 on Discord.
Punchline: oGCD helper

Author: Meli & perchbird
Name: Orchestrion Plugin
Description:
Orchestrion Plugin allows you to change the currently playing in-game BGM. It includes
a curated list of the most accurate in-game song titles, so you know exactly what's playing,
if you want to know later! Add favorite songs to separate them from the rest.
Note: This plugin does not currently allow you to play actual orchestrion songs.
Punchline: Adds a simple front-end for browsing and changing the in-game BGM.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Party List Layout
Description: Customize the layout of the party list.
Punchline: Customize the layout of the party list.

Author: tesu
Name: Penny Pincher
Description: Copies 1 below the cheapest offer to your clipboard when you check marketboard prices. /penny help

Author: Sevii
Name: Better Housing
Description: Select furniture based on what you see instead of a massive box. Always active indoors, doens't work outdoors, there's no config menu.
Punchline: Furniture selection that actually works properly

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Ready Check Helper
Punchline: Extends the game's built-in ready check.
Description: Displays the names of the players that were not ready in chat following the completion of a ready check, and optionally adds ready check status icons over the party and alliance lists.

Author: Cair
Name: Redirect
Description: Easily change the targeting priority for spells and abilities. Queue macros, sprint, and potions! Type /redirect to configure.
Punchline: Change where your actions are going, queue macros, queue sprint, and queue potions!

Author: srkizer
Name: ResetAudio
Description: Resets game audio device on demand.
Punchline: Do not let the game shut up.

Author: perchbird
Name: ResLogger2.Plugin
Description: A path logger with optional crowdsourcing functionality.

Author: Dragon
Name: Side HUD
Description: Provides fancy side HUD

Author: rennerdo30
Name: SimpleCompare
Description: Show simple item comparison when pressing SHIFT and hovering over item
Punchline: Simple item comparison

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks
Description:
Collection of simple ideas that are too small to warrent their own plugin.
/tweaks to open the config
Tweaks:
 - Lock chat size and position
 - Show exact percentage for item durability and spiritbond
 - Show current desynthesis level on desythable items.
 - Command to open character directory
 - Command to change tooltip settings.

Author: joshua.software.dev
Name: Size Matters when Fishing
Description: Provides labels to tell exactly how large fish are and how quickly they are moving while spearfishing.
Punchline: For the size evaluation challenged.

Author: wozaiha
Name: SkillDisplay
Punchline: Show the skills you used in the past few seconds.
Description: Show the skills you used in the past few seconds.

Author: Vielle Janlenoux
Name: Snooper
Description: Adds a /snooper command that shows a separate window that shows only messages from the player you're currently targeting. Useful for keeping track of different conversations during crowded RP events.
Punchline: See chat messages from your current target in a separate window.

Author: Sonar Team
Name: Sonar
Description: Relay hunts to other players in the community. /sonar to open, /sonarconfig to configure

Author: SupineSnail (Tinuviel)
Name: Job Gauge Adjustments
Description: Just a simple plugin to allow you to tweak parts of job gauges.
Punchline: Simple Job Gauges... but you can tweak them now!

Author: Avaflow
Name: TabTab
Description: Customise the behaviour of tab targeting. Use /ptab to open configuration.

Author: karashiiro
Name: TextToTalk
Description: Chat TTS. Use /tttconfig to configure the enabled channels and triggers/exceptions.

Author: attick & perchbird
Name: TitleEdit
Description: Create, share, and shuffle custom title screens for FFXIV.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Say What?
Punchline: Persistent NPC Flavor Text
Description: Prints NPC chat bubbles to the chat log.

Author: cassandra308
Name: Where am I again?
Description: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in up in the corner next to the server and time info. Open config with /waia.
Punchline: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in next to the server info.

Author: Lady Defile
Name: Wordsmith
Description: Wordsmith is a text editor with roleplayers in mind. It automatically breaks your text up for easy copy/paste, has advanced features, spellcheck, and even a thesaurus.
Punchline: A roleplay thesaurus and scratch pad.

Author: Kaz Wolfe
Name: XIVDeck Game Plugin
Description:
This plugin allows players to place virtually any hotbar-able action onto a Stream Deck, including hotbar slots themselves. Actions are called directly, meaning no keybinds or awkward settings are necessary.

Note that the XIVDeck Stream Deck plugin must also be installed for this plugin to be useful. You can download the Stream Deck plugin from the linked GitHub repository, under the "Releases" section.

Please report all problems to KazWolfe#2896 in the Dalamud Support server or by opening an Issue on GitHub.
Punchline: Integrate your Stream Deck with Final Fantasy XIV!
